thread.title: Florida school was aware of cracks hours before collapse

title: Florida school was aware of cracks hours before collapse
text:
Florida school was aware of cracks hours before collapse Saturday, March 17, 2018 - 00:53 
Hours before a newly built bridge collapsed at Florida International University, engineers along with state and school officials met to discuss a crack in the bridge and concluded it was not a safety concern. Linda So reports.
